subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: From April 23rd.

That would be sweet. I say since they are sooo in demand, you should be mak=
ing some money on them. This would also help to ensure that people are real=
ly interested in them enough that they would pay for them. If you give them=
 away for free, people will abuse the privilege.


  ----- Original Message=
 ----- 
  From: Frank Sumption 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Tues=
day, April 28, 2009 12:31 PM
  Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: From April 23rd.
=






  Sorry Susan, I don't sell the boxes. The ones of mine that are out =
I mostly give away to interested people, but--- I just don't have the time =
to make this stuff on demand, even if I did sell them. 

   However, I am w=
orking with another researhcer to see what we can come with for a kit of so=
rts, or maybe just a low cosr box. 

   Frank


  On Mon, Apr 27, 2009 at 1=
1:27 PM, kytten <kytten_karmicheal@...> wrote:




    Hi frank, I am=
 new to your ground and I was curious where if you have a site where you se=
ll the boxes that you make personally.. I know that I can I buy one of the =
standard boxes in various places or I could make one my self... if only I w=
as suave enough to be able to fallow the directions.. unfortunately I have =
never really been a direction type of person.
    I have always been extra =
sensitive and very interested in EVP and the paranormal every since I was v=
ery little and when I heard of your boxes recently I became very excited an=
d would love to buy one, can you point me in the right direction..
    Than=
k you, Susan
